scripts.first-start: npm i -g del-cli nodemon && cd backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i & cd.. && npm run dev
scripts.dev-update: del-cli --force backend/build && cd frontend && npm run build && xcopy build ..\backend\build /i /e && cd ../backend/src && nodemon server.js
scripts.electron-update: del-cli --force backend/build && cd frontend && npm run build && xcopy build ..\backend\build /i /e && cd ../backend && electron .
